thread.title: Excellent hotel and staff very helpful
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel and staff very helpful - Review of Jesmond Dene Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Brandon G
title: Excellent hotel and staff very helpful
text:
We stayed in the 5 person appartment which was above our expectations. It was very clean , spacious, two bathrooms and minutes away from underground.
The staff was very kind and helpfull infact the taxi that was going to take us back to the airport bailed on us just 2 hours before. One of the staff called his friend, a taxi driver and within 5 minutes we were on our way to the airport.
Noting super extreme luxary but you'll get friendly staff, good location , clean rooms and they also place your bags in the room if you arrive before check in.
Room Tip: clean rooms, friendly staff See more room tips
